vote.text: Amendment SA 3333 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3333 proposed by Senator Menendez to the amendment to H.R 4310. (consideration: CR S7793-7794) Of a perfecting nature.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3333 proposed by Senator Menendez to the amendment to H.R 4310.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3333 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
